CONFIGURATION.PANDORA_EMAIL_DOC: Enter your email address you registered with Pandora.
CONFIGURATION.PANDORA_ONE_DOC: Enable this if you have a Pandora One account.
CONFIGURATION.PANDORA_USE_CURL_302_WORKAROUND_DOC: Rewrite stream URLs to use Pandora server's IP address rather than host name
CONFIGURATION.PANDORA_BAND_FILTER_DOC: Enter a %-delimited string of bands you do not want to hear.  For example: Spice Girls%One Direction
CONFIGURATION.PANDORA_BAND_FILTER_LABEL: Filter out bands you don't want to hear separated by %, like Madonna%Metallica
